bmi_g_action.name: Red Butte Walk
bmi_g_action.pdf_box: Take a walk at Red Butte Garden. Visit 10 times to earn WellU credit.

full.text: It looks like you are doing great in this area!
As a "healthy recommendation" may we suggest taking a walk at Rwd Butte Gardens?

Taking a walk through Red Butte Garden isn't just a peaceful escape-it's a powerful way to support your well-being. As part of the WellU Program, regular walking can help reduce stress, improve heart health, and lower your risk of chronic disease. It's a simple step toward maintaining a healthier you-right here on campus.
Swipe your Ucard 10 times when you go for a walk at Red Butte Garden to earn WellU credit towards your insurance premium reduction.
Click HERE to learn more about Red Butte Garden hours and events!

bmi_noansw.name: PEAK Nutrition Consultation
bmi_noansw.pdf_box: Schedule your free PEAK nutrition consultation.

full.text: You skipped this question.
In-Person & Virtual options
If you are looking for somewhere to get started addressing you food/nutrtion habits a free Nutrition Consultation may be for you!
In this 60-minute one-on-one session, our dietitian will help you create a personalized nutrition plan that fits your lifestyle, preferences, and goals.
What you can expect:
Practical, sustainable strategies tailored to you
Guidance rooted in your real-life routines-not rigid meal plans
Support to help you build long-term, healthy habits
A focus on progress, not perfection
Empower yourself to make lasting changes that feel good and work for you.
Click HERE to schedule your free Nutrition Consultation.

bmi_5.name: I want to learn more about a Weight Management program

full.text: You chose to learn more about a Weight management program.
Virtual (online) offering

You can register for weight management, administered through Noom. This program is more than just losing weight-it's about building sustainable habits for a healthier lifestyle. Noom combines psychology, personalized coaching, and science-backed tools to help you understand your behaviors, make mindful choices, and stay motivated. With daily lessons, progress tracking, and a supportive community, Noom empowers you to take control of your health-one small, achievable step at a time.
Click HERE to learn more about Weight Management or call 801-213-8720.

bmi_6.name: I want to learn about the  Lifestyle Medicine Consultation
bmi_6.pdf_box: Learn more about a Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

full.text: You chose to learn more about the Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

Lifestyle Medicine is the medical specialty that utilizes lifestyle intervention - healthy eating, physical activity, stress management, optimizing sleep, boosting social connection, avoiding risky substances - to treat and reverse chronic disease.

During your consultation, you and your lifestyle medicine provider will develop a personalized action plan tailored to your goals through expert guidance to help you make lasting changes. You will be offered ongoing support and accountability if desired.
Click HERE to Learn more and request your Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

meta_g_action.name: Red Butte Walk
meta_g_action.pdf_box: Take a walk at Red Butte Garden. Visit 10 times to earn WellU credit.

full.text: It looks like you are doing well in this area!
We know that maintaining good health is just as important as treating poor health. The good news is that health maintenance can be simple and enjoyable.

Taking a walk through Red Butte Garden isn't just a peaceful escape-it's a powerful way to support your well-being. meta_1.name: I want to register for the National Diabetes Prevention Program (NDPP)
meta_1.pdf_box: Register for the National Diabetes Prevention Program (NDPP).

full.text: You chose to register for the National Diabetes Prevention Program (NDPP).
In-person & Virtual options
The National DPP is a proven, evidence-based, year-long lifestyle change program designed to help you prevent or delay the onset of Type 2 diabetes through small, achievable steps.
With the support of a trained lifestyle coach and a group of peers, you'll learn how to:
Eat healthier without giving up the foods you love
Get active in ways that fit your life
Manage stress and stay motivated
Build habits that last a lifetime
This isn't a diet. It's a lifestyle shift-backed by science and built for real life.
Click HERE to learn more and register for the National Diabetes Prevention Program (NDPP).

meta_1b.name: I want to register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP)
meta_1b.pdf_box: Register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP).

full.text: You chose to register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP).
In-Person & Virtual options
The Intensive Lifestyle Program is a powerful 10-week  group program. This program is designed to help you build lasting habits for a healthier, more energized life.
In this dynamic, group-based program, you'll explore the foundations of:
Movement - Find joy in staying active
Nutrition - Learn to fuel your body with confidence
Stress Management - Discover tools to feel more balanced and in control
Each week, you'll gain practical strategies, expert guidance, and the support of a like-minded community-all focused on helping you create real, sustainable change.
Click HERE to learn more and register for the Internsive Lifestyle Program (ILP).

meta_3.name: I want to schedule a free Exercise Prescription

full.text: You chose to schedule a free Exercise Prescription.
In-Person & Virtual options

This 60-minute session is designed to help you move smarter, not just harder. Whether you're managing a health condition, just getting started, or simply looking for a safe and effective way to stay active, our experts  will work with you to create a customized exercise plan tailored to your unique needs and goals.
In your session, you'll:
Receive a personalized exercise prescription based on your health status and fitness level
Learn proper form and technique to move safely and effectively
Explore exercises that fit your lifestyle and preferences
Gain confidence and motivation to stay active long-term
No matter your starting point, we'll help you move forward-safely, confidently, and with purpose.
Click HERE to schedule your free Exercise Prescription.

nutr_g_action.pdf_box: Join an interactive Nutrition Workshop to add new recipes to your rotation.

full.text: Your answers to the food and nutrition questions indicate that you are doing well in this area!

As a "healthy recommendation" we invite you to join our hands-on Nutrition Workshops and discover how to create simple, nutritious, and delicious meals. Whether you're a beginner or just looking for fresh ideas, these interactive sessions will introduce you to new recipes and practical tips for incorporating healthy ingredients into your everyday routine.
What you'll get:
Fun, hands-on cooking experiences
Easy, nutritious recipes to try at home
Tips for making healthy eating sustainable and enjoyable
A variety of rotating topics to keep things fresh
Click HERE to check out our current Nutrition Workshops and register today.

nutr_4.name: I want to register for an Intuitive Eating class
nutr_4.pdf_box: Register for an Intuitive Eating class.

full.text: You chose to register for an Intuitive Eating Class.
In-Person and Virtual options
Intuitive Eating helps you build a healthy, joyful relationship with food, movement, and self-care.
In this class you'll learn to:
Enjoy food without guilt
Move your body to feel good
Respect and appreciate your body
Let go of diet rules
Nourish yourself with kindness
Backed by decades of research, Intuitive Eating is linked to:
Better body image and self-confidence
More satisfaction with food
Greater self-compassion
Less anxiety, guilt, and binge eating
Click HERE to register for an Intuitive Eating class.

nutr_6.name: I want to learn about the Lifestyle Medicine Consultation
nutr_6.pdf_box: Learn more about a Lifestyle Medicine Consultaion.

full.text: You chose to learn more about the Lifestyle Medicine Consultation

A Lifestyle Medicine consultation is a collaborative visit where you and your provider focus on the daily habits that impact your health the most-using evidence-based strategies to support long-term wellness and disease prevention.
During your comprehensive consultation, a lifestyle medicine provider will assess key areas of your well-being, including:
Nutrition
Physical activity
Sleep quality
Stress management
Social support and connection
You'll receive:
A personalized action plan tailored to your goals
Expert guidance to help you make lasting changes
Ongoing support and accountability
The potential to reduce or even reverse symptoms of chronic disease.
Click HERE to Learn more and request your Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

activity_g_action.name: Fitness assessment
activity_g_action.pdf_box: Schedule a fitness assessment to learn even more about your fitness.

full.text: Your responses to the physical activty questions show that you take exercise seriously!
As a "healthy recommendation" we invite you to schedule a PEAK Fitness Assessment.
A PEAK Fitness Assessment is a great way to evaluate your current fitness level and set meaningful, personalized goals for the future.
During this 60-minute session, we'll assess key areas of your fitness, including:
Cardiovascular endurance
Muscular strength and endurance
Flexibility
Body composition
You'll receive a detailed report comparing your results to age-based norms, along with expert recommendations to help you improve or maintain your fitness.
Click HERE to schedule your PEAK Fitness Assessment.

In-Person & Virtual options

If you are Looking for a fun and convenient way to stay active there are a number of options for fitness classes right here on campus! Whether you prefer in-person or virtual workouts, there's something for everyone:

PEAK Health and Fitness offers a wide variety of employee-only fitness classes-available both virtually and at locations across campus. https://app.healthcare.utah.edu/peakCourseRegistration/byCategories   https://campusrec.utah.edu/group-fitness/
Student Life Center provides access to dynamic group fitness classes with a membership. https://campusrec.utah.edu/group-fitness/
Tanner Dance features adult fitness classes that blend movement and creativity. https://shop.tannerdance.utah.edu/tickets/events/adult-osher
No matter your schedule or fitness level, there's a class to help you feel your best. Explore your options and sign up today

stress_g_action.name: Mindfulness Class & Curalinc Online Resources
stress_g_action.pdf_box: Learn more about available resources to support your wellbeing.

full.text: Looks like you are managing stress well- Keep it up!

Managing your stress is a great way to guarantee better health!   Our Mindfulness Classes offer practical tools to help you slow down, breathe deeply, and live more intentionally-no matter your background or experience level.
We offer three unique class options to meet your needs with both in-person and virtual options:
Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR)
An evidence-based program designed to help you manage stress, anxiety, and chronic pain through meditation, gentle movement, and self-awareness practices.
Everyday Mindfulness
Perfect for beginners or those looking to build a consistent practice. Learn simple, effective techniques to bring mindfulness into your daily life-at work, at home, and everywhere in between.
Flourishing in Medicine
Created specifically for medical team members, this class focuses on resilience, emotional well-being, and connection in high-stress healthcare environments.
Each class is guided by experienced instructors and offers a supportive, welcoming environment to help you grow your practice and improve your well-being.
Click HERE to learn more and register for a class today.

stress_noaction.name: Stress Resource Template & Assess your stress link
stress_noaction.pdf_box: When you're ready, learn more about resources to help you assess your stress.

full.text: You chose not to take action to address your stress today.
Even though you chose not to take action today, we want you to know you have access to tools and resources to "Assess your Stress".

By identifying your unique stressors and creating a personalized plan to address them, you can build resilience, improve your well-being, and feel more in control of your day-to-day. Whether it's work, relationships, or just the pace of life, small changes can lead to big relief.
Click HERE to access the free Asess your stress toolkit.

stress_2.name: I want to learn about SupportLinc employee assistance program
stress_2.pdf_box: Access the SupportLinc using group code: uofu.

full.text: You chose to learn more about the Supportlinc Employee Assistance Program.

Life can be unpredictable-but you don't have to face it alone. SupportLinc, your Employee Assistance Program (EAP), offers free, confidential support to help you manage life's challenges-big or small.
Whether you're dealing with stress, anxiety, relationship issues, grief, or work-life balance, SupportLinc provides:
24/7 access to licensed counselors
Short-term, solution-focused therapy
Legal, financial, and family support resources
Online self-guided tools and wellness content
Getting started is easy. Click HERE and use group code: uofu to access your benefits today.

stress_3.name: I want to make my own plan
stress_3.pdf_box: Learn how to assess your stress and how you can make your own plan.

full.text: You chose to make your own plan to address your stress.
To help you in build your plan we have put together a quick tool to help you learn how to "Assess your stress".

By identifying your unique stressors and creating a personalized plan to address them, you can build resilience, improve your well-being, and feel more in control of your day-to-day. Whether it's work, relationships, or just the pace of life, small changes can lead to big relief.
Click HERE to access the free Asess your stress toolkit.

stress_4.name: I want to join an exercise class

full.text: You chose to register for an exercise class to help alleviate your stress.
In-Person & Virtual options
Exercise is one of the most effective - and natural - ways to manage stress. Physical activity boosts your mood, clears your mind, and helps your body process tension in a healthy way.

Joining an exercise class adds structure, motivation, and community to your routine. Whether it's yoga, strength training, or a dance class, moving with others can lift your spirits and help you stay committed to your well-being.
Click HERE to check out current classes and register today.

full.text: You chose to learn more about the Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

Lifestyle Medicine is the medical specialty that utilizes lifestyle intervention - healthy eating, physical activity, stress management, optimizing sleep, boosting social connection, avoiding risky substances - to treat and reverse chronic disease.

During your consultation, you and your lifestyle medicine provider will develop a personalized action plan tailored to your goals through expert guidance to help you make lasting changes. You will be offered ongoing support and accountability if desired.
Click HERE to Learn more and request your Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

stress_6.name: I want to schedule a free Leisure Consultation

full.text: You chose to schedule a free Leisure consultation.
In-Person and Virtual options

In today's hustle culture, we often overlook the value of rest, play, and personal time. Our Leisure Consultation helps you rethink your relationship with free time and discover how leisure can support your health, identity, and overall well-being.
In this one-on-one session, you'll:
Explore how you currently spend your time
Identify gaps, stress points, and opportunities for joy
Reframe your mindset around rest and productivity
Build a personalized plan for meaningful, energizing leisure
Whether you're navigating a life transition, seeking better work-life balance, or simply want to reconnect with what brings you joy-this session is for you.
Click HERE to schedule your free Leisure Consultation.

anx_g_action.name: Mindful awareness tools
anx_g_action.pdf_box: Explore mindfulness tools that support your wellbeing.

full.text: Great job taking steps to manage your anxiety/worry.
Using mindfulness tools-like breathing exercises, meditation, or simply taking a moment to pause-can help reduce stress, improve focus, and boost resilience.
We invite you to keep exploring what works best for you; even a few mindful minutes a day can make a meaningful difference.
Click HERE to explore some mindfulness resources that may be helpful.

full.text: You asked for help finding a Mental Health provider.
Life can be challenging, and it's okay to ask for help. Seeking emotional support is a powerful step toward healing, growth, and greater well-being.
Whether you're feeling overwhelmed, stuck, anxious, or simply need someone to talk to, connecting with a mental health professional can help you:
Gain clarity and emotional balance
Build resilience and coping strategies
Improve relationships and self-understanding
Feel more supported and less alone
HMHI Behavioral Health Network (BHN) can help you find a mental health provider that fits your individual preferences, Access the Provider Directory tool HERE.
Supportlinc employee assistance program can help connect you to the care you need in a way that fits you. Learn more about this resource by clicking HERE and use group code: uofu.

full.text: You chose to make your own plan to address your emotional well-being.
Taking the initiative to create your own plan for better health is a meaningful step. We know that change can feel overwhelming at times, and you don't have to do it all at once.
To support your journey, we've gathered some helpful resources you can explore whenever you're ready-at your own pace, in your own way.
Supportlinc.com (group code:uofu)
24/7 access to licensed therapists
24/7 access to online resources
HMHI Behavioral Health Network
Provider Search Tool (put the link here):
Access to local in-network therapist that meet your preferences
You chose to register for a Mindfulness Class.
In-person and Virtual options
Our Mindfulness Classes offer practical tools to help you slow down, breathe deeply, and live more intentionally-no matter your background or experience level.
We offer three unique class options to meet your needs:
Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR)
An evidence-based program designed to help you manage stress, anxiety, and chronic pain through meditation, gentle movement, and self-awareness practices.
Everyday Mindfulness
Perfect for beginners or those looking to build a consistent practice. Learn simple, effective techniques to bring mindfulness into your daily life-at work, at home, and everywhere in between.
Flourishing in Medicine
Created specifically for medical provider teams, this class focuses on resilience, emotional well-being, and connection in high-stress healthcare environments.
Each class is guided by experienced instructors and offers a supportive, welcoming environment to help you grow your practice and improve your well-being.
Click HERE to register for a Mindfulness class today.

sleep_g_action.name: sleep tools
sleep_g_action.pdf_box: Learn more about getting an even better night's sleep.

full.text: Your sleep hygiene looks great!
Sleep is a vital part of your health and performance. Just like exercise and nutrition, quality sleep is essential for energy, focus, mood, and long-term well-being.

Improving your sleep fitness means creating healthy habits that support deep, restorative rest. From setting a consistent bedtime to creating a calming nighttime routine, small changes can lead to big benefits.
Click HERE for tips and tools for ways to get an even better night's sleep.

sleep_noaction.name: sleep tools
sleep_noaction.pdf_box: When you're ready, learn more about improving your sleep.

full.text: You chose not to take action to address your sleep hygiene today.
We get that it can be hard to make changes-especially when it comes to sleep. Whether it's a busy schedule, stress, or just not knowing where to start, you're not alone.
While you chose not to take action right now, improving sleep can have a big impact on your energy, focus, and overall health. When you're ready, even small steps can make a meaningful difference.
When you are ready to get started, we have put together some resources to help you get a better nights sleep.
Click HERE for resources and tools for better sleep.

sleep_noansw.name: sleep tools
sleep_noansw.pdf_box: When you're ready, learn more about improving your sleep.

full.text: It looks like you chose not to answer this questions.
Sleep isn't a luxury-it's a vital part of your health and performance. Just like exercise and nutrition, quality sleep is essential for energy, focus, mood, and long-term well-being.

Improving your sleep fitness means creating healthy habits that support deep, restorative rest. From setting a consistent bedtime to creating a calming nighttime routine, small changes can lead to big benefits.
We have put together some tools to help you get a better nights sleep.
Click HERE to access resources for a better nights sleep.

sleep_1.name: I want to register for a virtual insomnia class
sleep_1.link: Alert sent to Wellness Team to submit order for insomnia class
sleep_1.pdf_box: A member of our team will reach out to register you for a virtual insomnia class.

full.text: You chose to register for the Virtual Insomnia class. This is a 5-week virtual group treatment where you'll be asked to keep a sleep diary, and to make adjustments to your sleep schedule and sleep habits throughout the group.

The CBT-I group is intended for adults with insomnia, especially for those with difficulties that have lasted several months or more.  These difficulties can include problems falling asleep, staying asleep, or waking up too early, that negatively impact your quality of life.

This treatment can work well for adults with other physical health or mental health conditions, and for people already being treated for other sleep conditions such as Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA) or Restless Leg Syndrome (RLS).

If you're wondering if you have one of these sleep conditions, such as OSA or RLS, but haven't yet been diagnosed or treated for it, please talk to your primary care provider before signing up for this group.
A member of our team contact you to schedule this class soon.

sleep_2.name: I want to create my own plan
sleep_2.pdf_box: Create your own plan. Here are some useful resources to get started.

full.text: You chose to make your own plan to address your sleep hygiene.

To support you we've gathered some helpful resources you can explore whenever you're ready.
Click HERE to explore resources to help you improve your sleep.

With PEAK Health Coaching, you'll get:

Support every step of the way
Start your journey to better health today-Click HERE to schedule your free Health Coaching session.

tobacco_noaction.name: PDF resources to quit
tobacco_noaction.link:
Link for pdf nad 2nd header: 
https://www.addictiontoolkit.tools/ways-to-quit-smoking-for-good

link for first header: https://employeewellness.utah.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/44/2020/07/Regence-Empower-Program.pdf
tobacco_noaction.pdf_box: When you're ready, learn more about support available for quitting smoking.

full.text: You chose not to take action to address your tobacco/nicotine use today.

Quitting tobacco/nicotine is one of the most powerful steps you can take for your health-and it's never too late to start. From boosting your energy and lung function to reducing your risk of serious illness, the benefits begin almost immediately.
You don't have to do it alone. With the right tools, support, and mindset, you can break free from tobacco/nicotine and reclaim your well-being.
We have put together some resources to help you find success in quitting.
[these headers should be the links in column D]
Regence Empower Program: Free nicotine replacement products
https://employeewellness.utah.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/44/2020/07/Regence-Empower-Program.pdf
Ways to Quit Smoking
https://www.addictiontoolkit.tools/ways-to-quit-smoking-for-good

full.text: Looks like you skipped this question.
If you ever have any questions or need help getting started in any area please feel free to reach out to our team.

tobacco_1.name: Utah Quit line
tobacco_1.pdf_box: Learn more about Way to Quit and the Utah Tobacco Quit Line (1-800-Quit-Now)

full.text: You chose to access the Utah Quit line to address your Tobacco/Nicotine use.
Quitting tobacco/nicotine is one of the best decisions you can make for your health-and with Way to Quit and the Utah Tobacco Quit Line, you don't have to do it alone.

Way to Quit offers free, confidential tools to help you break free from nicotine-on your terms. Whether you prefer online support, text coaching, or a personalized quit plan, you'll find the resources you need to succeed at waytoquit.org.
Prefer to talk it out? Call the Utah Tobacco Quit Line at 1-800-QUIT-NOW for one-on-one support from trained quit coaches.
You'll get expert guidance, encouragement, and even access to free nicotine replacement therapies.
Click HERE to access tools to help you quit today.

alcohol_1.name: I want to work with SupportLinc to address my substance use.
alcohol_1.pdf_box: Access Supportlinc and the Addiction Navigator (Use Group code: uofu).

full.text: You chose to work with Supportlinc EAP to address your alcohol use.
With SupportLinc's innovative Addiction Care Navigator, help is just a click away.

The Addiction Care Navigator offers a quick, clinically validated assessment to help you understand your risk level and create a personalized action plan. Whether you need short-term counseling or more intensive treatment, SupportLinc connects you to the right care-fast.

If your assessment shows elevated risk, a trained Addiction Care Coach will reach out (with your consent) to guide you through treatment options, verify insurance coverage, and even help make the call to a provider.
Click HERE to access Supportlinc and the Addiction Navigator (Use Group code: uofu).

drug_1.name: I want to work with SupportLinc to address my substance use.
drug_1.pdf_box: Access Supportlinc and the Addiction Navigator (Use Group code: uofu).

full.text: You chose to work with Supportlinc EAP to address your substance use.
With SupportLinc's innovative Addiction Care Navigator, help is just a click away.

The Addiction Care Navigator offers a quick, clinically validated assessment to help you understand your risk level and create a personalized action plan. Whether you need short-term counseling or more intensive treatment, SupportLinc connects you to the right care-fast.

If your assessment shows elevated risk, a trained Addiction Care Coach will reach out (with your consent) to guide you through treatment options, verify insurance coverage, and even help make the call to a provider.
Click HERE to access Supportlinc and the Addiction Navigator (Use Group code: uofu).

drug_2.name: I want to learn more about HMHI Addiction Recovery Services
drug_2.pdf_box: Learn more about HMHI Addiction Recovery Services.

full.text: You chose to work with Huntsman Mental Health Institute Addiction Recovery Services.
HMHI Addiction Recovery Services are designed for individuals at any stage of their journey.

Whether you are  looking to cut back, take a break, or make a more lasting shift, HMHI Addiction Recovery Services offers a number of personalized, nonjudgmental support programs grounded in evidence-based care.
Click HERE to explore whats possible today.

drug_3.name: I want to work on this area with my primary care provider
drug_3.pdf_box: Work with your primary care provider to address your substance use. Click the icon for help finding a primary care provider.

full.text: You chose to work with your Primary Care Provider to address your substance use.
Your Primary Care Provider is a great partner in creating a plan that will help you regain control of your well-being  with a collaborative approach to better health.
Don't have a provider yet or looking for someone new? Our Primary Care Navigation Team is here to help you find the right fit, someone who will understand you.
Click HERE for help finding a Primary Care Provider.

drug_4.name: I want to make my own plan
drug_4.pdf_box: Create your own plan. Here are some useful resources to get started.

full.text: You chose to make your own plan to address your substance use.
Taking the initiative to create your own plan for better health is a meaningful step. We know that change can feel overwhelming at times, and you don't have to do it all at once.
To support your journey, we've gathered some helpful resources you can explore whenever you're ready-at your own pace, in your own way.
Click HERE to access resources to help you put together your plan.

drug_5.name: I want to learn about the Lifestyle Medicine Consultation
drug_5.pdf_box: Learn more about a Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

full.text: You chose to learn more about the Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

Lifestyle Medicine is the medical specialty that utilizes lifestyle intervention - healthy eating, physical activity, stress management, optimizing sleep, boosting social connection, avoiding risky substances - to treat and reverse chronic disease.

During your consultation, you and your lifestyle medicine provider will develop a personalized action plan tailored to your goals through expert guidance to help you make lasting changes. You will be offered ongoing support and accountability if desired.
Click HERE to Learn more and request your Lifestyle Medicine Consultation.

gen_noaction.name: general health
gen_noaction.pdf_box: When you're ready, learn more about resources available to support your wellbeing.

full.text: You chose not to take action to address your general health rating today.
We understand that making changes to your health can be hard and that sometimes, just figuring out where to start can be confusing.
We also know that sometimes the best thing to do is just start somewhere, so we have put together some resources to help you get started. If you need more help we are always here to help!
Click HERE to explore resources and get started improving your health today!

full.text: You didn't enter a response for this question.

Lifestyle Medicine is the medical specialty that utilizes lifestyle intervention - healthy eating, physical activity, stress management, optimizing sleep, boosting social connection, avoiding risky substances - to treat and reverse chronic disease.

During your consultation, you and your lifestyle medicine provider will develop a personalized action plan tailored to your goals through expert guidance to help you make lasting changes. You will be offered ongoing support and accountability if desired.

gen_1.name: I want to schedule a free Health Coaching session
gen_1.pdf_box: Schedule your free health coaching session.

full.text: You chose to schedule a free Health Coach session.
In-Person & Virtual options
Our expert Health Coaches offer one-on-one guidance tailored to your unique goals and lifestyle.
Whether you're looking to boost energy, manage stress, improve nutrition, or build sustainable habits, we're here to help you succeed.
With PEAK Health Coaching, you'll get:
Personalized goal setting and action plans
Ongoing motivation and accountability
Expert strategies for lasting lifestyle changes
Support every step of the way
Start your journey to better health today-Click HERE to schedule your free Health Coaching session.

gen_3.name: I want to register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP)
gen_3.pdf_box: Register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP).

full.text: You chose to register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP).
In-Person & Virtual options
The Intensive Lifestyle Program is a powerful 10-week  group program. This program is designed to help you build lasting habits for a healthier, more energized life.
In this dynamic, group-based program, you'll explore the foundations of:
Movement - Find joy in staying active
Nutrition - Learn to fuel your body with confidence
Stress Management - Discover tools to feel more balanced and in control
Each week, you'll gain practical strategies, expert guidance, and the support of a like-minded community-all focused on helping you create real, sustainable change.
Click HERE to learn more and register for the Internsive Lifestyle Program (ILP).

gen_4.name: I want to work on this area with my primary care provider
gen_4.pdf_box: Work with your primary care provider to address your health concerns. For help finding a provider, click the icon above.

full.text: You chose to work with your Primary Care Provider to address your health concerns.

Partnering with your primary care provider is a powerful step toward improving your overall well-being. Together, you can create a personalized plan to address your health risks and support your long-term goals.

Don't have a provider yet or looking for someone new? Our Primary Care Navigation Team is here to help you find the right fit-someone who understands your needs and supports your journey to better health.
Click HERE to find a Primary Care Provider near you.
